product_name: The North Face Valkyrie Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Valkyrie soft-shell jacket for men is windproof to protect against the chill of summit winds, but its active fit and breathability make it a good choice for most any aerobic activity. GORE(R) WINDSTOPPER(R) is 100% windproof; water repellent and breathable; and makes less noise than a hardshell. WINDSTOPPER is tightly woven for abrasion resistance and stretchy comfort; microfleece lining offers soft, warm comfort and manages moisture. Pit zips vent excess heat. Helmet-compatible hood with hidden cord locks and laminated wire brim is fully adjustable for a close fit that provides unhindered peripheral vision. Soft, lined collar shields neck from the cold, and the interior draft flap rolls over zipper to protect chin from abrasion. Features a drawcord hem and adjustable cuffs. The North Face Valkyrie jacket has zippered handwarmer pockets placed so they won't interfere with pack straps or a climbing harness.
short_description: The North Face Valkyrie soft-shell jacket for men is windproof to protect against the chill of summit winds, but its active fit and breathability make it a good choice for most any aerobic activity.
